item.title: Automated Design Appraisal
item.description: This work represents the first-time financial valuation is integrated within architectural design evaluation. In review

item.title: Visual Capital
item.description: This paper introduces a viewpoint visual share simulation, view-metrics, and a novel index Visual Capital. Published in Landscape and Urban Planning, Dec 2023.
